de.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration.data

Class GlobalConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration.data.GlobalConfiguration

  • public class GlobalConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Class holding the list of known PluginConfigurations and the name of the currently loaded configuration.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps

      • setCurrentConfiguration

        public boolean setCurrentConfiguration(java.lang.String new_default)
        Sets the current configuration to new_default. If new_default is unknown, the methods returns false, and true if it had successfully changed the configuration.
        Parameters:
        new_default - New current configuration.
        Returns:
        True if the change was successful, false if new_default is unknown.

      • getCurrentPluginConfiguration

        public PluginConfiguration getCurrentPluginConfiguration()
        Returns the current PluginConfiguration.
        Returns:
        The current plugin configuration.

      • getPluginConfiguration

        public PluginConfiguration getPluginConfiguration(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the PluginConfiguration called name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the PluginConfiguration.
        Returns:
        The PluginConfiguration, or null there is no PluginConfiguration called name.

      • getCompatibleConfigurations

        public java.lang.String[] getCompatibleConfigurations(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Returns a sorted String array containing the name of all configurations compatible with the pluginName plugin.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - Name of the plugin.
        Returns:
        Sorted string array with the names of all compatible configurations.

      • substituteConfiguration

        public void substituteConfiguration(PluginConfiguration pluginConfiguration)
        If a PluginConfiguration in the list of plugin configurations has the same name than pluginConfiguration, then pluginConfiguration is substituted for the former configuration in the list. If no such configuration exist, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        pluginConfiguration - New plugin configuration to substitute.

      • addConfiguration

        public boolean addConfiguration(PluginConfiguration pluginConfiguration)
        Attempts to add pluginConfiguration to the plugin configuration list. If a PluginConfiguration with the same name exists, then it returns false.
        Parameters:
        pluginConfiguration - PluginConfiguration to be added.
        Returns:
        True if the configuration was added, false otherwise.

      • doesConfigurationExist

        public boolean doesConfigurationExist(java.lang.String configName)
        Checks if a PluginConfiguration bearing the name configName exists.
        Parameters:
        configName - Name of the configuration.
        Returns:
        True if the configuration exists, false otherwise.

      • getGlobalSettings

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getGlobalSettings()
        Returns the global settings.
        Returns:
        Global settings.

      • setGlobalSettings

        public void setGlobalSettings(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> globset)
        Sets the global settings.
        Parameters:
        globset - New global settings.
